meanings.definition: The action of assessing someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The teacher's assessment of the students' progress was helpful.
meanings.sent2: The company conducted an assessment of the market before launching the new product.
meanings.sent3: The assessment of the cat's ability to catch mice was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her assessment of the situation as a sinking ship was quite accurate.
meanings.sent5: The assessment of the storm's intensity made everyone take cover.

meanings.definition: The evaluation or estimation of the nature, quality, or ability of someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The assessment of the painting's value was challenging.
meanings.sent2: The assessment of the employee's performance was positive.
meanings.sent3: The assessment of the dog's intelligence left everyone surprised.
meanings.sent4: His assessment of her character as kind was spot on.
meanings.sent5: The assessment of the mountain's height was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A formal examination or testing of someone's knowledge or proficiency.
meanings.sent1: The assessment of the students' understanding of the topic was thorough.
meanings.sent2: The assessment of the athlete's skills was rigorous.
meanings.sent3: The assessment of the robot's programming was amusingly complex.
meanings.sent4: Her assessment of his cooking as top-notch was surprising.
meanings.sent5: The assessment of the singer's voice was truly impressive.
